column5: Nightly rate for first 4 guests then $25/person/night for the 4th & 5th guests Maximum of 6 guests  Step back in time and relax in this charming, cozy, mid-century cottage (built in the 1930's but recently renovated) located in mid-town Galveston, Texas -> walking distance to both beach or The Strand. 2B/2B. Full kitchen. Washer/Dryer available for use.
